lead_paragraph: McGIFFERT--Michael (Mike), was born on October 5, 1928 and died on July 2, 2016 in Williamsburg, Virginia. A memorial service will be held on Saturday, August 20, at 4pm at the Williamsburg Unitarian Universalists church. Please see full obituary at www.bucktroutfuneralhome. net. 1/3
